scripts.db:migrate: powershell -NoProfile -Command "Get-ChildItem ./sql/*.sql | Sort-Object Name | ForEach-Object { Write-Host \"Applying\" $_.Name; Get-Content $_.FullName | docker exec -i loyalty-db psql -U postgres -d loyalty -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 }"
scripts.db:reset: docker exec -i loyalty-db psql -U postgres -d loyalty -c "TRUNCATE TABLE rewards, receipts, merchant_members, merchants, users RESTART IDENTITY CASCADE;"
